name: UIPointerStyle
desc: An object that defines the pointer shape and effect.

items.name: init(effect: UIPointerEffect, shape: UIPointerShape?)
items.desc: Applies the provided content effect and pointer shape to the current region.

items.name: init(shape: UIPointerShape, constrainedAxes: UIAxis)
items.desc: Morphs the pointer into the provided shape when hovering over the current region.

items.name: class func hidden() -> Self
items.desc: Hides the pointer when it moves over the current region.
